20101214220605.333|20101214220607.000|CCO|WHITEOUT.

20101214220613.667|20101214220615.333|CCO|BASICALLY A U.S. INTERSTATE THAT
20101214220615.333|20101214220617.000|CCO|GOES FROM PORT HURON OVER TO 
20101214220617.000|20101214220618.667|CCO|BUFFALO.

20101214220628.000|20101214220630.000|CCO|IT'S CLOSED.

20101214220633.429|20101214220634.857|CCO|HIGHWAYS.
